name: RogueFish
description:
You have to find the exit on each levels while surviving the enemies.
The exit cost 10 food to use, so you will need to collect some.

Empty room at start ? Press R !

Commands :
WASD / ZQSD / Directionals arrows : Move around
Space : Dash
R : Reset the game
M : Mute the game
Numpad + / - : Respectively increase / decrease the volume
